memberdef.name: gemv_q4_k_ref

briefdescription.para: Matrix-vector multiply with Q4_K weights (scalar reference)

parameterdescription.para: Weight matrix in Q4_K format [M x K], stored row-major
Number of columns (must be multiple of 256)

briefdescription.para: GEMM/GEMV kernels with Q4_K quantized weights.

detaileddescription.para:
Implements matrix multiplication where:
Activations (input): FP32
Weights: Q4_K (4.5 bits/weight, nested scales)
Output: FP32
Key optimization: Fused dequantization - weights are dequantized in registers and immediately used in FMA, never written to memory.

Operations:
gemv_q4_k: Matrix-vector multiply (batch=1, token generation)
gemm_q4_k: Matrix-matrix multiply (batch>1, prefill)
